Text.Page:
My orders say Thunder Hold. Lots of important work to do, giant relics lying about for the taking, enough research to keep an archaeologist happily employed for a lifetime.

I knowâ€”this isn't Thunder Hold. The prions ran us off, and now I'm stuck here.

The relics are still there, of course. Perhaps you'd be willing to collect a few for me?
Thank you, <PCNAME>. Perhaps this posting won't be a complete loss.
I'm sorry you came all the way back from Thunder Hold, but I'll need more than this.
